posts.title: Git常用命令
posts.text: 将当前分支修改的暂存，并新建一个分支，将暂存的代码pop到新分支中 git stash git checkout -b develop git stash pop 当push到错误的远程分支时： 方法一（不会删除提交历史记录，会新建一个提交作为回滚） git revert HEAD git push origin master 方法二（删除历史记录） git reset –hard HEAD^ git push origin master -f 当你要恢复已回滚的分支时： git reflog git reset –hard “版本号” 设置一个分支的追踪远程分支 git branch –set-upstream-to=origin/develop develop 创建一个分支并绑定远程分支 git checkout -b ‘local branch name’ ‘remote branch name’ Merge 放弃merge操作 git reset –merge

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
